Improvements.Improvement: Refactor repetitive code into a method
Improvements.Description: There are several identical lines of code where a RuntimeBeanReference is created, added to argumentResolvers, and added to returnValueHandlers. This repetitive code can be refactored into a method to make the code more readable and maintainable.
In the section handling marshaller and unmarshaller, instead of checking if the attribute exists and then creating a RuntimeBeanReference, you can use Optional to handle the possible null value.
